mapper.select: SELECT rule.ruleId, ruleName, pointCode, alarmCode FROM T_BAS_ALMNOTICE_RULE rule LEFT JOIN (SELECT ruleId, GROUP_CONCAT(pointCode) AS pointCode FROM T_BAS_ALMNOTICE_RULE_POINT_REL GROUP BY ruleId) station ON rule.ruleid = station.ruleid LEFT JOIN (SELECT r.ruleId, GROUP_CONCAT(def.ALARMCODE) AS alarmCode FROM T_BAS_ALM_DEF def, T_BAS_ALMNOTICE_RULE_TYPE_R r WHERE def.ALMTYPEID = r.ALARM_TYPE GROUP BY r.ruleId) alarm ON rule.ruleid = alarm.ruleid WHERE alarmCode IS NOT NULL AND pointCode IS NOT NULL AND rule_status=1

SELECT rule.ruleId, ruleName, pointCode, alarmCode FROM T_BAS_ALMNOTICE_RULE rule LEFT JOIN (SELECT ruleId, GROUP_CONCAT(pointCode) AS pointCode FROM T_BAS_ALMNOTICE_RULE_POINT_REL GROUP BY ruleId) station ON rule.ruleid = station.ruleid LEFT JOIN (SELECT r.ruleId, GROUP_CONCAT(def.ALARMCODE) AS alarmCode FROM T_BAS_ALM_DEF def, T_BAS_ALMNOTICE_RULE_TYPE_R r WHERE def.ALMTYPEID = r.ALARM_TYPE GROUP BY r.ruleId) alarm ON rule.ruleid = alarm.ruleid WHERE alarmCode IS NOT NULL AND pointCode IS NOT NULL AND rule_status=1 AND rule.ruleId=#{ruleId}

SELECT urule.RULEID AS ruleId, urule.NOTICE_TYPE AS noticeType, u.USERNAME AS userName, u.TEL AS phone, u.EMAIL AS email FROM T_BAS_ALMNOTICE_RULE_USER_REL AS urule, T_BAS_USER AS u WHERE urule.NOTICE_USERID = u.USERID union all select ruleId, NOTICE_TYPE as noticeType, null as userName, ( case notice_type when 1 then notice_info else null end ) as phone, ( CASE notice_type when 2 THEN notice_info ELSE NULL END ) AS email from T_BAS_ALMNOTICE_RULE_USER_REL where NOTICE_USERID is null

SELECT * FROM (SELECT urule.RULEID AS ruleId, urule.NOTICE_TYPE AS noticeType, u.USERNAME AS userName, u.TEL AS phone, u.EMAIL AS email FROM T_BAS_ALMNOTICE_RULE_USER_REL AS urule, T_BAS_USER AS u WHERE urule.NOTICE_USERID = u.USERID UNION ALL SELECT ruleId, NOTICE_TYPE AS noticeType, NULL AS userName, ( CASE notice_type WHEN 1 THEN notice_info ELSE NULL END ) AS phone, ( CASE notice_type WHEN 2 THEN notice_info ELSE NULL END ) AS email FROM T_BAS_ALMNOTICE_RULE_USER_REL WHERE NOTICE_USERID IS NULL) AS r WHERE RULEID= #{ruleId}
SELECT alarmCode, ALMTYPEID AS alarmType, `DESCRIPTION` AS alarmDesc FROM T_BAS_ALM_DEF
SELECT pointCode, stdpointCode AS MN, systemType AS ST, pointName FROM T_PS_BAS_POINTLIST
